long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Football Extension gives you an easy way to change your Chrome Browser new tab default to look attractive and pleasing to the eye.

This is a free add-on for Chrome Browser where the primary target is to set a background from our selective Football images gallery powered by Unsplash in your Chrome Browser default new tab. We are actually changing your Chrome browser default new tab page.

Also as an added feature, we are giving you an easy way to search your desired information, images, video, and more through Bing search.
